url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Naga-scale Bindi/Lunar naga

sections.body: Once per day, the wearer can spend a standard action to fascinate all creatures within 30 feet, as per the spell hypnotism (Will DC 19 negates). Poison effect: 1d3 Con and 1 Wis.

name: Lunar naga
